title: WHOA-VID, Introverts “Thriving” 10.5.20
itunes:title: WHOA-VID, Introverts “Thriving” 10.5.20
description:
In episode 729, Miles and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by True Romance's hosts Carolina Barlow and Devin Leary to discuss the Texas governor's blatant voter suppression, the reaction to Trump's positive Covid diagnosis, introverts versus extroverts in the pandemic, Rick Moranis being punched, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Texas governor limits election drop boxes to one per county in sprawling state
  2. Conspiracy-Theory Twitter Is Going Nuts Over Trump’s COVID Diagnosis
  3. White House wanted to keep Hope Hicks's positive COVID-19 test private: report
  4. Trump Team Knew of Hicks’ Positive Test—but Went Ahead With Golf Club Fundraiser
  5. Who Around Trump Has the Coronavirus
  6. Introverts faring worse than extraverts emotionally and psychologically amid the COVID-19 pandemic
  7. RICK MORANIS PUNCHED IN UNPROVOKED ATTACK ... Says He's Fine
  8. WATCH: Beak> - Kenn

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
